name: pnp-list-formatting-project-gantt-chart
title: Project Gantt Chart View
shortDescription: This project Gantt Chart sample demonstrates how to show a list of high level tasks in a Gantt chart. It is mainly useful for top-level views.
longDescription: This project Gantt Chart sample demonstrates how to show a list of high level tasks in a Gantt chart. It is mainly useful for top-level views.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
